content.rendered:
Directed by Pandiraj

Written by Pandiraj. Pandiraj. Pandiraj. Sanjeev Tiwari

Cast Sivakarthikeyan (Arumpon). Bharathiraja (Arumpon’s Grandfather). Soori (Paraman). Aishwarya Rajesh (Thulasi). Anu Emmanuel (Maangani). Yogi Babu (Lawyer (Special Appearance)). Samuthirakani (Chandrabose (Arumpon’s Father)). Nataraja Subramanian (Ayyanar). R.K. Suresh (Dharma). Archana (Arumpon’s Mother). Aadukalam Naren (Ayyanar’s Uncle). Vela Ramamoorthy (Arumpon’s Eldest Paternal Uncle). Subbu Panchu (Arumpon’s Paternal Uncle). Shanmugarajan (Arumpon’s Paternal Uncle (as Shanmugha Rajan)). Muthuraman (Arumpon’s Paternal Uncle). Rama (Arumpon’s Aunt). Aadhira Pandilakshmi (Arumpon’s Aunt). Nadodigal Gopal. Thamizh (Arumpon’s Nephew). Arundhathi.Ajay Natraj. Joshua Parisutham (Thulasi’s Brother). Sheela Rajkumar

Languages Tamil

Production Sun Picture. Sun Picture. Goldmines Telefilm
